divs: sighting details1) setting: front patio of house, 9:55pm wednesday june 6th, 2012 2) n\a 3) n\a 4) listed below 5) farfetched\skeptical, excited\intrigued 6) lost sight as it disappeared over horizon first unidentified object: 1) large bright lighted "orb." appeared spherical, light did not waver nor did it blink (as if a plane, helicopter would) 2) within atmosphere, at least 1 mile from surface, relative to passenger plane altitudes 3) origin west, direction east- strict path, did not stray from route 4) pace was significantly faster than a plane\helicopter yet, was in view for approximately 2-3 minutes second unidentified object: 1) same characteristics as first ufo but smaller in size, originated from north west heading east. 2) seen approximately 5 minutes after first ufo witness.
Summary: 2 Bright White, Unwavering Orbs heading East at Moderately Fast Pace. W/in Atmosphere
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Columbia
